content: n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end that is to say do not continue the sunshine pattern on n3 or n4 for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 2 continue with sunshine pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 round 3 continue with sunshine pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 4 continue with sunshine pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 repeat rounds 1 to 4 to decrease the gusset until you have a total of 48 stitches or 12 stitches on each of your 4 needles then continue knitting n1 and n2 in the texture pattern and n3 and n4 in stockinette until the foot of the sock measures approx 1 5 inches 3 5 cm shorter than your desired foot length from back of your heel to end of your big toe be sure to end after round 4 8 or 12 toe decrease round 1 n1 k1 ssk k to end n2 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 n3 k1 ssk k to end n4 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 round 2 k across all stitches n1-n4 repeats rounds 1 and 2 above until only 6 stitches remain on each needle total 24 stitches distribute evenly on 2 needles with a tapestry needle use the kitchener stitch to close the toe or alternately use the three needle bind off method weave in ends soak and block if desired congratulations you re done now you re ready to go ahead with sock two 4 © the kitchen sink shop abbreviations k knit p purl pm place stitch marker on needle sm slip_stitch marker onto right needle n - needle ssk slip 1 stitch knit wise onto right needle slip another stitch knit wise onto right needle then knit the two stitches together k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one stitch p2 decrease purl 2 stitches together as one stitch s1 purl wise - slip one stitch purl wise with yarn held in front s1 knit wise - slip one stitch knit wise with yarn held in back rs right side of work ws wrong side of work notes this pattern is written with a traditional heel flap and gusset but you can substitute any heel flap you like questions email me at thekitchensinkshop@gmail com i d love to see your sunshine on my feet socks tag me @thekitchensinkshop #sunshineonmyfeetsocks 5 © the kitchen sink shop
